meanings.sent1: She cheered overenthusiastically at the game.
meanings.sent2: He always talks overenthusiastically about his favorite movie.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail overenthusiastically when it saw its owner.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed overenthusiastically after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The children laughed overenthusiastically at the clown's jokes.

meanings.sent1: Her overenthusiastically decorated room was full of bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The overenthusiastic fans cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The overenthusiastic chef added too much spice to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The overenthusiastic student raised their hand for every question.
meanings.sent5: The overenthusiastic puppy jumped around the room with joy.
